name: EPT Aviation Training (Pty) Ltd
about: EPT Aviation Training (Pty) Ltd is a South African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA) accredited training organization, specializing in aviation training for over 12 years. We train Cabin Crew, Flight Attendants, and Air Hostesses, with hundreds of graduates flying for international and local airlines each year. Our blended learning programs include a cabin crew licensing course, covering all SACAA-required modules such as safety and emergency procedures, first aid, and aircraft type training. We utilize a fully operational cabin simulator for lifelike training and conduct frequent aircraft visits. Our training academy is located in Rhodesfield, Kempton Park, and we offer classroom and online components to ensure comprehensive training. With a focus on safety, quality, and professional development, EPT Aviation Training prepares students to efficiently handle any situation on board an aircraft, ensuring they are well-equipped for a successful career in aviation.
